column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I met up with some friends here on a Saturday night at 730pm.  It was very crowded
column3: and we were told it would be an hour.  We waited near the bar for over an hour
column4: and continually was told it would be another 15 minutes.  This went on until 945 when we were finally seated.  So yes
column5: we waited for over 2 hours.  You may be wondering why I am giving 4 stars
column6: but I will get there in a minute...
